dcterms:creator: R. E. Kalman
dcterms:description: The latent linear dynamical system (LDS) model describes neural population activity as a noisy linear projection of a low-dimensional latent variable governed by linear dynamics with Gaussian noise.
dcterms:title: Latent Linear Dynamical System (LDS) Model

dcterms:creator: Marius Pachitariu
Biljana Petreska
Maneesh Sahani
dcterms:description: The low-rank linear recurrent neural network (RNN) model represents observed neural activity as a noisy linear projection of the activity at the previous timestep, constrained to have low-rank connectivity.
dcterms:title: Low-Rank Linear Recurrent Neural Network (RNN)

dcterms:creator: Sung-Phil Kim
John D Simeral
Leigh R Hochberg
John P Donoghue
Michael J Black
dcterms:description: High-dimensional neural population activity is described in terms of linear projections of low-dimensional latent variables with linear dynamics.
dcterms:title: High-Dimensional Neural Population Activity

dcterms:creator: Anne C Smith
Emery N Brown
dcterms:description: This dataset involves estimating a state-space model from point process observations, which is relevant for analyzing neural data.
dcterms:title: State-Space Model from Point Process Observations

dcterms:creator: Biljana Petreska
M Yu Byron
John P Cunningham
Gopal Santhanam
Stephen I Ryu
Krishna V Shenoy
Maneesh Sahani
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the dynamical segmentation of single trials from population neural data, which is crucial for understanding neural dynamics.
dcterms:title: Dynamical Segmentation of Single Trials from Population Neural Data

dcterms:creator: Joao Semedo
Amin Zandvakili
Adam Kohn
Christian K Machens
M Yu Byron
dcterms:description: This dataset involves extracting latent structure from multiple interacting neural populations, which is important for understanding neural dynamics.
dcterms:title: Extracting Latent Structure from Multiple Interacting Neural Populations

dcterms:creator: Jakob H Macke
Lars Buesing
John P Cunningham
M Yu Byron
Krishna V Shenoy
Maneesh Sahani
dcterms:description: This dataset provides empirical models of spiking in neural populations, which are essential for understanding neural coding.
dcterms:title: Empirical Models of Spiking in Neural Populations

dcterms:creator: Evan W Archer
Urs Koster
Jonathan W Pillow
Jakob H Macke
dcterms:description: This dataset involves low-dimensional models of neural population activity in sensory cortical circuits, which are important for understanding sensory processing.
dcterms:title: Low-Dimensional Models of Neural Population Activity in Sensory Cortical Circuits
